category.title: Fizikal / Physical
category.description: Sentuhan yang tidak diingini seperti meraba, menyondol, mencium, dsb. Unwanted grobing, squeezing, kissing, etc.

category.title: Lisan / Verbal
category.description: Komen tentang tubuh, merenung, bersiul, hinaan seksual. Comments about your body, staring, catcalling, sexual insult.

category.title: Visual
category.description: Mempamerkan atau mengedarkan bahan lucah, melukis sesuatu yang seksual, dsb. Showcasing or distributing pornography, drawing sexual materials, etc.
